ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Urban Legends
ComicInfo.Summary:
The search for Deathwatch continues! As Leo, Mikey, and Donatello face new hardships in Arkansas, Raph attempts to scare some sense into the criminal underbelly of the city with a very familiar—and unsettling—disguise. What happens when the long-lost Master Splinter comes face-to-face with the Shredder?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Frank Fosco (a) & Courtland Brugger (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Frank Fosco (a), Erik Larsen (a), Reuben Rude (c) & I.H.O.C. (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 3 |
